Name: Albus Dumbledore
Description: Albus Dumbledore is considered one of the greatest headmaster of?Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?and the most powerful wizard of his time. Dumbledore holds the Order of Merlin, First Class, for Grand Sorcery. He was the headmaster while?Harry Potter attended school and also a professor while Tom Riddle, who would later become Voldemort, attended school. Dumbledore founded theOrder of the Phoenix, a resistance against the reign of the dark wizard Voldemort, and he was the only wizard of which Voldemort was afraid.
Academic: Former Headmaster at Hogwarts, Gryffindor House
wand: 15 inch elder wood with thestral hair
Quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live. Remember that.
Stories: Deathly Hallows, Dumbledore's Scandal, The Order of the Phoenix
Relationships: Ariana Dumbledore (sister), Aberforth Dumbledore (brother), Percival Dumbledore (father),  Kendra Dumbledore (mother)

Name: Ariana Dumbledore
Description: Ariana Dumbledore was the youngest sister to?Albus Dumbledore?and Aberforth Dumbledore. When she was 6-years-old, muggle boys attacked Ariana because they wanted to see her perform magic. Traumatized, from then on she could not control her magical abilities. Her father seeked revenge on the muggle boys and was sent to?Azkaban, while the rest of the family moved to Godric's Hollow and hid Ariana away. They did this so she would not be sent to?St. Mungo's, as her instability threatened the?Statute of Secrecy.
Quote: It destroyed her, what they did: She was never right again. She wouldn't use magic, but she couldn't get rid of it; it turned inward and drove her mad, it exploded out of her when she couldn't control it, and at times she was strange and dangerous. But mostly she was sweet and scared and harmless.
Relationships: Albus Dumbledore (brother), Aberforth Dumbledore (brother), Percival Dumbledore (father),  Kendra Dumbledore (mother)

Name: Harry Potter
Description: Harry Potter is?The Boy Who Lived, one of the most famous wizards of his time. In July 1980, Voldemort tried to murder Harry Potter while he was still a baby, afraid of a prophecy that said Potter would be the one to defeat him. His mother Lily Potter sacrificed herself for Harry, which gave Harry an ancient form of protection magic based on love. This protection caused Voldemort's killing curse to backfire onto himself, but left Harry with a lightning-shaped cursed scar on his forehead. This created a connection between Harry and Voldemort, allowing Harry to speak Parseltongue.
Academic: Former Student at Hogwarts, Gryffindor House
wand: 11 inch holly wood with phoenix feather
Quote: Every great wizard in history has started out as nothing more than what we are now, students. If they can do it, why not us?
Stories: Deathly Hallows, The Boy Who Lived
Relationships: Ginny Weasley (wife), James Potter (father), Lily Evans (mother), Petunia Dursley (aunt), Vernon Dursley (uncle), Dudley Dursley (cousin), Albus Severus Potter (son), Lily Potter (daughter), James Potter II (son)
